name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Inner Peace - Experience Peace In One Click

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Take a short mindful break to calm down and find inner peace. Just one click away.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Experience inner peace in minutes with the No.1 Chrome Extension for Inner Peace.

Calm down with serene music, beautiful landscapes and inspiring quotes.

Inner Peace is a tool that helps you quickly escape the emotional and physical struggles of day to day life. With just a click of a button, it will transport you into a safe haven for inner peace and relaxation. 

Changes: Improved audio loading performance, added more quotes

HOW TO USE / HOW TO FIND INNER PEACE

Instructions:

Getting started is easy as A-B-C. Grab your headphones or earphones, hit the "heart" extension icon, and instantly get lulled into a deeply relaxed state by peaceful meditative, ambient music, inspiring quotes, and beautiful scenery.

It is the perfect getaway from endless meetings, crazy bosses, hectic schedules, and personal issues that wear you down. It is a great reminder to stay present at the moment, to calm yourself down, and remind yourself that everything is going to be okay. Download the Inner Peace Chrome Extension now and experiences inner peace and bliss now for free.
